title: test
description: We are excited to present to you our first workshop of the 2015 year on MATLAB, most popular software package for computation and data visualization. We will be introducing the basics of using MATLAB, which is commonly used in both industry and academia and is definitely a useful skill to add to your resume! Our knowledgeable presenters will be providing a step-by-step tutorial on using the most important features of MATLAB, as well as highlighting the capabilities of the program. No prior knowledge of programming or MATLAB is required. Seating is limited!
